#summary Get the latest working copy

== Where is the repository? ==

The source code to Shiny is held in a central repository hosted by [http://sourceforge.net/scm/?type=svn&group_id=208504 SourceForge] which you can [http://shinyprofiler.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/shinyprofiler/ browse online].

=== Command-line access  ===

Use this command to check out the latest source code anonymously:
{{{
svn checkout https://shinyprofiler.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/shinyprofiler/trunk shinyprofiler
}}}

=== GUI and IDE access ===

This project's Subversion repository may be accessed using many different [http://subversion.tigris.org/links.html#clients client programs and plug-ins].
